register.name: SP
register.description: Stack Pointer register points to last used location on the runtime stack

register.name: FP
register.description: Frame Pointer register used to point to the current procedure's activation record

register.name: CYCLES
register.description: Execution cycle count register (least significant 32 of 64 bits)

register.name: CYCLES2
register.description: Execution cycle count register (most significant 32 of 64 bits)
